_sText:
current server where you can try this map is  ...updated server  2/11/2019  23.134.192.238:27015


The server has bots so there is always competition for you; I should mention bots will not populate until there is a player on the server so you may have to join for bots to appear as active.

this server will have many 007 Goldeneye Maps from Nintendo 64 as well as Perfect Dark. There are also some Bond Maps from playstation 2 games among others.

  I am thrilled to share this map with you. It's a real gem. Bots get around fine on this map; as you try it for the first time I recommend you start on the CT forces. Nintendo 64 N64 007 Goldeneye Temple map recreated for Counter Strike Source; it's fairly different; different enough to be an amazing Counter Strike Source map while retaining some 007 feel. map preview on youtube this has two bomb placement locations; technically four bomb locations if you count lower and upper levels as separate(actually there is 6 locations if you plant it hanging off the ledge of the upper level the bomb will float-no problem can still be defused). The fist bomb site  is close to T spawn, however go the distance to the further bomb site and there are far more hiding spots to  snipe a defuser so it's a nice trade off. Easily move between the upper and lower levels of the map; many choke points for conflict.  
Bots work nicely with this map; though the first few rounds they tend to travel in groups.  I hope this see this on regular rotation on many servers one day! 

I hope you find this map to be of great quality and share with others! I look forward to seeing many reviews of this map!
